languages.text: "Десятина — священная плата за возможность быть частью Империума Человечества. Всяк, кто это отрицает — вор, предатель и еретик".
"The Great Tithe is a sacred payment necessary for earning the privilege of being part of the Imperium. Anyone who denies this is a thief, a heretic, and a renegade."
languages.original_text: "Десятина — священная плата за возможность быть частью Империума Человечества. Всяк, кто это отрицает — вор, предатель и еретик".

traits.locale_text: "The Tithe is a sacred payment for the privilege of being part of the Imperium of Humanity. Anyone who would deny this is a thief, a heretic and a renegade."
"The Tithe is a sacred payment necessary for earning the privilege of being part of the Imperium of Humanity. Anyone who denies this is a thief, a heretic, and a renegade."
"The Tithe is a sacred payment necessary for earning the privilege of being part of the Imperium of Humanity. Anyone who denies this is a thief, a heretic, and a renegade."
"The Great Tithe is a sacred payment necessary for earning the privilege of being part of the Imperium. Anyone who denies this is a thief, a heretic, and a renegade."
"The Great Tithe is a sacred payment necessary for earning the privilege of being part of the Imperium. Anyone who denies this is a thief, a heretic, and a renegade."

languages.text: "Der Große Zehnt ist eine heilige Zahlung für das Privileg, Teil des Imperiums zu sein. Wer ihn verweigert, ist ein Dieb, ein Ketzer oder ein Gesetzloser."
languages.original_text: "The Great Tithe is a sacred payment necessary for earning the privilege of being part of the Imperium. Anyone who denies this is a thief, a heretic, and a renegade."

traits.locale_text: "Der Große Zehnt ist eine heilige Zahlung für das Privileg, Teil des Imperiums zu sein. Wer ihn verweigert, ist ein Dieb, ein Ketzer oder ein Gesetzloser."

languages.text: « La dîme est une contribution sacrée que l'on doit verser pour jouir du privilège d'appartenir à l'Imperium. Quiconque remet en question cet état de fait est un voleur, un hérétique et un renégat. »
languages.original_text: "The Great Tithe is a sacred payment necessary for earning the privilege of being part of the Imperium. Anyone who denies this is a thief, a heretic, and a renegade."

traits.locale_text: « La dîme est une contribution sacrée que l'on doit verser pour jouir du privilège d'appartenir à l'Imperium. Quiconque remet en question cet état de fait est un voleur, un hérétique et un renégat. »

languages.text: “为了获得成为帝国领土的特权，必须缴纳神圣的大什一税。所有否认这一点的人都是窃贼、叛徒、异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "The Great Tithe is a sacred payment necessary for earning the privilege of being part of the Imperium. Anyone who denies this is a thief, a heretic, and a renegade."

traits.locale_text: “为了获得成为帝国领土的特权，必须缴纳神圣的大什一税。所有否认这一点的人都是窃贼、叛徒、异端分子。”

languages.text: «El diezmo es un pago sagrado, necesario para ganarse el privilegio de formar parte del Imperium. Cualquiera que lo niegue es un ladrón, un hereje y un renegado».
languages.original_text: "The Great Tithe is a sacred payment necessary for earning the privilege of being part of the Imperium. Anyone who denies this is a thief, a heretic, and a renegade."

traits.locale_text: «El diezmo es un pago sagrado, necesario para ganarse el privilegio de formar parte del Imperium. Cualquiera que lo niegue es un ladrón, un hereje y un renegado».

languages.text: 「偉大なる租税は、帝国の一員たる特権を得るために必要不可欠な神聖な奉納である。これを否認する者は、泥棒であり、異端者であり、反逆者に他ならない」
languages.original_text: "The Great Tithe is a sacred payment necessary for earning the privilege of being part of the Imperium. Anyone who denies this is a thief, a heretic, and a renegade."

traits.locale_text: 「偉大なる租税は、帝国の一員たる特権を得るために必要不可欠な神聖な奉納である。これを否認する者は、泥棒であり、異端者であり、反逆者に他ならない」

languages.text: "Büyük Aşar, İmparatorluk'un parçası olma ayrıcalığını kazandıran mukaddes bir ödemedir. Bunu inkâr eden hırsızdır, kâfirdir, haindir."
languages.original_text: "The Great Tithe is a sacred payment necessary for earning the privilege of being part of the Imperium. Anyone who denies this is a thief, a heretic, and a renegade."

traits.locale_text: "Büyük Aşar, İmparatorluk'un parçası olma ayrıcalığını kazandıran mukaddes bir ödemedir. Bunu inkâr eden hırsızdır, kâfirdir, haindir."
